documents.document: Congratulations. Lovely news. Well done everyone. https://t.co/j1MV4woXiY
@HBIndependents @gilly171 @orbiscat Thank you
@gilly171 @orbiscat I hope so too. I don't have any further details sorry Helen.
Thanks to a constituent who has advised me that sadly there has been an accident on Birchgrove Road. Expect delays. @orbiscat
Very sad. I remember him fondly - I loved to chat to him about all things #Rhiwbina. Enjoyed watching the Dr Who fi… https://t.co/3jUNrme9WK
@shed_cardiff @treecontrol8 Shed Marketing were very helpful indeed. I really enjoyed working with them on the first @RhiwbinaStFF.
Congratulations to Ysgol y Wern and @BirchgrovePrm for their Green School Status. A number of Rhiwbina pupils attend these great schools.
Congratulations to @RhiwbeinaPrm, @LlanishenFach & Greenhill Special School for their green school status. Fantastic achievements.
@Paullwilliams Hi. The officers tell me the works are complete. Can you DM me your contact number please? I will raise your concerns.
@katczeks Hi. Will get some speed studies done here by our local policing team and will send the results to the Council. Thanks.
Thanks to everyone who has been in touch regarding the petition on Wauntreoda & neighbouring roads. https://t.co/fD0Z3ULWcp @BenjaminGThomas
@jo_verity Great. Thanks Jo.
Thanks Steve https://t.co/7E6l2Gf7cB
A resident from Pen y Dre has advised that the power is now back on. Thanks @wpduk @swpcardiff & our traffic light officers for your help.
Spoken to @swpcardiff to request officers to be at the Pen y Dre / Heol y Deri traffic lights at peak times whilst lights lights are out.
@wpduk Thanks. I've logged with the Council. Is this not liked to this power cut? It is adjoining the affected properties?
@wpduk Thanks. Does this include the traffic lights.
Traffic lights are off at the Heol y Deri / Beulah Road Junction. Engineers are heading to the site. Expect traffic delays. #Rhiwbina
@CardiffGrump Hi. Engineers are on their way. Will keep you posted.
@wpduk Thanks for your help. Has this affected the traffic lights on Beulah Road / Heol y Deri?
@CardiffGrump I will find out.
Latest news for properties on Pen y Dre who are without power. Please see photo. https://t.co/CVLOrxScJY
@wpduk Thank you.
@jo_verity @Adrian1Robson 64 properties in Pen y Dre are affected by the power cut due to a problem with an underground cable.
64 properties in Pen y Dre are affected by the power cut due to a problem with an underground cable.
Update - a number of properties are currently without power in Pen y Dre. Hoping to provide a timescale soon for power to be restored.
@wpduk Hello CF14 6EH.
@jo_verity @Adrian1Robson Just finding out now.
@wpduk Hello. Has the power gone off in Rhiwbina? Thanks

Here's the details of why @rhiwbinatennis won Tennis Club of the Year. Full article here - https://t.co/FDJhbt2DU0 https://t.co/f4bzTNCsW2
@AddyShaggy Hi. We think it's a lane close to Lansdowne Avenue. Will let you know if we hear anything further.
Well done @rhiwbinatennis for winning Club of the Year. A brilliant achievement. @ThomasJames77 @tenniswales https://t.co/aFgkzKcb6x
Whoops! https://t.co/toNDOyyO2p
Wishing my horse Rhiwbina Pantmawr good luck tonight! I'm right behind you!!!! @Adrian1Robson https://t.co/ge202iMMDl
Pleased to support the Old St Mellons Race Night. Thanks to @JoelTory for arranging the horses. Mine is called Rhiw… https://t.co/Tr0QxqY5sP
@AddyShaggy Hi. I don't know sorry but will try and find out.
Really sorry to hear a constituent lost two cats this week. The area referred to in the message is off Pantbach Roa… https://t.co/NrM1rnUg7A
Being a #DementiaFriend is so important. Here's a free training session in early February in #Rhiwbina.… https://t.co/bD1RpissQy
@carregynyheol Thanks. Worth taking a look at the Council Report for the area which will give an overview.
@carregynyheol Here's the report which went through Council unanimously yesterday - https://t.co/Q33FnXCg19
@carregynyheol We will see thousands of jobs for the region, investment from the private sector, metro & other projects to be determined.
Here's some advice from @swpcardiff regarding Rogue Traders. https://t.co/lk8HexYIDH
The very special @ccvgms performed @CityHallCardiff today @HMD_UK Memorial Service. Hauntingly beautiful pieces. Te… https://t.co/vsayziIeuU
Very moving contributions from young people, the Youth Choir & Orchestra & Holocaust survivor Eva Clarke. We must n… https://t.co/794b2PtAqM
Council has just finished with around a third of Councillors left. #cdfcouncil
@HETRA14 Couldn't agree more sadly. Terrible atmosphere.
@samknight @Adrian1Robson @Alecs99 @AshleyGovier @neiljmcevoy @cardiffcouncil Great - thanks Sam.
@PEBradbury We need change - pleased there appears to be cross party agreement. Sad times...
Yes. Tonight has been a total embarassment for the City. I've had several messages from people watching the webcast… https://t.co/hB0C5A8SBd
@greyprawn Thanks. We need clear answers and confirmation of a site in Cardiff North. Will keep you posted,
@Cymrugas We are told it will be closing when they find a recycling site in Cardiff North - but they give no details whatsoever.
@j10012884 I honestly don't know is the truthful answer. I wish they would listen to the public support and accept the petitions.
Whitchurch Road has now reopened.
Pleased to move an amendment about applying resources to pursue people who fly tip & litter & to retain a waste site on Wedal Road.
@huggzy Hi. I don't know anything further I'm sorry. Will let you know if I hear anything.
On a positive note, I'm delighted that the #CityDeal received unanimous support from across the political divide. #cdfcouncil
@GoodwayCardiff What is happening to this Council? I'm ashamed.
I am ashamed of this Council. The behaviour and attitude is appalling. And to try and stifle debate is the last straw. #cdfcouncil
Avoid Whitchurch Road - it is currently closed in both directions.
Only 98 days until you can vote for your next #cdfcouncil and the Councillors you wish to serve you. We live in interesting times.
@Jeffrey62093861 @Craig4CardiffN Please take a look at the Council's website. The report is on there.
@GoodwayCardiff I agree, but both can work hand in hand. The devil is in the detail as you say.
@GoodwayCardiff The detail will be forthcoming. You always speak about the importance of a City Region & this is another avenue for progress
Pleased to see a leading Labour Councillor @GoodwayCardiff acknowledge that the #CityDeal is a Conservative initiative.
Lord Mayor ruled out 15 minutes extension following a request from @Adrian1Robson. Thankfully officer stepped in & allowed a vote & we won.
Thousands of jobs & investment will be coming into the City Region. Thanks @Craig4CardiffN for championing this from the start. #cdfcouncil
@GoodwayCardiff @gavinhilljohn With great respect Russell, it's not 'a con'. It's totally transparent what's on offer.
Pleased to pay tribute to Chief Executive Paul Orders & his staff for producing a very comprehensive report on the #CityDeal. #cdfcouncil
It's a lottery now to see who gets called to speak on the #CityDeal. We should suspend standing orders and have a full debate. #cdfcouncil.
Astonished that the Lord Mayor is allowing just 8 speakers to talk on the #CityDeal. Such an important issue for #Cardiff. #cdfcouncil.
Currently debating the #CityDeal. An exceptional opportunity for the City Region to promote job growth & investment. #cdfcouncil
@HBIndependents @oliverwowen No they don't. Ignoring 1000's of people who signed petitions and wrote in. Ignore the public at their peril.
@RobTR Very accurate tweet. His words were so misplaced.
Good question in the Chamber from @oliverwowen regarding Wedal Road. No commitment from Labour to keep a site open on this road. #cdfcouncil
Paid tribute to ex Lord Mayor Cllr Derrick Morgan. He was such a wonderful man who fundraised for @LlamauUK & @CardiffFoodbank. #cdfcouncil
Paid tribute to ex Lord Mayor & Councillor John Smith. He was kind to Councillors across the political divide & will be missed. #cdfcouncil
Cardiff Councillors had a minutes silence to mark the passing of ex Lord Mayors John Smith, Derrick Morgan & Cllr Len Ackerman. #cdfcouncil
You can follow the business of #cdfcouncil this afternoon via this weblink - https://t.co/DfcMMXpBDB. From 4.30pm.
Video : 'Sit down you're rocking the boat'. A few tickets for tomorrow nights performance of Guys & Dolls. Tickets… https://t.co/HaQGUUzZD9
Huge congratulations to the ever impressive #Rhiwbina RATS. Incredible performance of Guys and Dolls. Well done eve… https://t.co/YSgocTe7qq
Details of #Rhiwbina Gets Together. https://t.co/BsQRXrWoif
@fatcontroller12 @HSBC Really sad times. A shock to see the one in the City Centre scheduled to close.
Avoid Manor Way if you can as there has been an accident opposite the Lower School.
@SheilaDuers Hi. I've logged this with officers.
The Pantmawr Inn outside area looks amazing. Well done Jen & James. Roll on the Summer. https://t.co/efDrKVfdO5
@SheilaDuers @eleanorsanders @airheadhell @RhiwbinaInfo Thanks Sheila.
@Caradoc33 @j10012884 @huwsilk @WalesOnline I understand the Council may have a site in mind, but no details released as yet.
@j10012884 @huwsilk @WalesOnline Absolutely right.
@greyprawn The Cabinet Member before the current person proposed to keep a facility on Wedal Road. Sensible proposal.
@FenellaBowden @Craig4CardiffN @cardiffcouncil Here's the direct link - https://t.co/a5lmsXACOZ
@FenellaBowden @Craig4CardiffN @cardiffcouncil The report has been emailed to us, and it's on the website. Really comprehensive report.
@KenLiverton @huwsilk @WalesOnline Absolutely. Essential.
We need to do more to tackle people who are caught littering and fly tipping - https://t.co/rmJJvROzTA via @huwsilk
